API_ID.description: Get this value from API development tools - "my.telegram.org/apps" at App api_id:

API_HASH.description: Get this value from API development tools - "my.telegram.org/apps" at App api_hash:

BOTLOGS.description: Your BOTLOGS group id e.g: -100xxx or skip this to use autopilot instantly. YOU NOT UNDERSTAND? THEN DO NOT CHANGE 0 !!

HANDLER.description: Initial command handler (prefix), supported characters "github.com/kastaid/getter/blob/main/getter/config.py". Default: [ . ]

TZ.description: Set local timezone: Continent/Country. Get list from "gist.github.com/illvart/0d2fcba7b8a7b337bfe0ad58c6f4d4dd". Default: Asia/Jakarta
